survey_name: Smart Home Security System Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in smart home security system features, installation, and customer support.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your smart home security system?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your smart home security system?

questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure the options are clearly labeled and easy to tap on mobile devices.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of installation for your smart home security system?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Consider including an optional open-text follow-up for details.
